Conjuration 3

Herd of Elephants

Various nations(12)

Ritual
N2
spell id [id]: 254
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 2398
number of effects [nreff]: 505
gems required [gemcost]: 25N
Summon Units:#2398 Elephant x 5+[1/2 lvl]
Restricted to Realm:8
This ritual summons a herd of elephants and makes them loyal to the caster. Elephants are devastating when released upon enemy armies, but if they flee they will trample through the ranks of their own side as well.
